### International Development Research Centre Seeks Proposals for Consultant to Conduct Knowledge Synthesis Study on Gender Equality in and through Education
#### Tender Information
* **Title (English)**: KIX Knowledge Synthesis Scoping Study on Gender Equality in and through Education
* **Title (French)**: Mandat pour l’étude de synthèse des connaissances du KIX sur l’égalité des genres dans et par l’éducation
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01025361
* **Amendment Number**: 2

**Procurement Details**

* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-10
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-10T13:00:00 (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Procurement Category**: Professional Services / Program Advisory Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Unspecified
* **Region of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity Name**: International Development Research Centre
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 150 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0B2, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Lindsay Empey
	+ **Email**: [lempey@idrc.ca](mailto:lempey@idrc.ca)

**RFP Description**

The International Development Research Centre (IDRC) seeks a consultant to conduct a knowledge synthesis study on gender equality in and through education in KIX projects. The consultant will be expected to carry out the requirements described in section 2 of the Statement of Work (“Services”).
